author: Sarah Ferris and Heather Caygle
title: Democrats urge White House to step up as minority communities hit hard by coronavirus
description: “One wonders if you begin to identify this as a ‘black virus,” says Rep. Sheila Jackson Lee.
content: On private caucus calls in recent weeks, several members have raised the idea of giving more money to Native American tribes to help fight the virus in their communities. And House Democratic Caucus Chairman Hakeem Jeffries (D-N.Y.) stressed Wednesday that la… [+4803 chars]
